donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
Localization to E-governance.
- Standardized e-platform model for a Geog Administration Office developed and experimented in a selected dzongkhag at two rural geogs and one urban area.
- Forestry and Dzongkhag-geog e-services developed and piloted as an integral part of One-Stop-Shop Approach in a selected dzongkhag at two rural geogs and one urban area.
- National replication plan on the local e-platform model and commonly used services developed.
